Interface com.chimu.form.query.Constant

public interface Constant
extends QueryExpression
A ConstantValue allows a basic, SQL convertible "ValueObject" to be added to a query description. The most common examples of objects you may want to directly add to the SQL statement are numbers, strings, and booleans.

See Also:
newDirectValueWrapper
